text: NGC 6061 is a lenticular galaxy with radio activity located about 490 million light-years away in the constellation Hercules. The galaxy is classified as a head-tail radio galaxy and was discovered by astronomer Lewis Swift on June 8, 1886. NGC 6061 is a member of the Hercules Cluster. ==See also== * List of NGC objects (6001–7000) ==References== ==External links== 6061 57137 Category:Hercules (constellation) Category:Hercules Cluster Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1886 Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Radio galaxies 10199
title: NGC 6061
